a.n: Curieuse De Nature Dans Les Îles

p.d: A new season of our favourite curious reporter! From Ouessant to Ré, and further afield in Guadeloupe, the biologist and storyteller Myriam Baran heads off to different islands to reveal the secret lives of the animals and the incredible stories of nature. Presented by: Myriam Baran. Directed by: Olivier Chasle (season 3, France, 2017)
